attributes.action: change his governments thinking on ID cards, it would be a waste of time and money, rather tighter border controls using modern technology, fingerprints and Iris scanning for entry and exiting the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rather spend the money on border copntrols, One of the facts; the introduction of ID cards had little effect during the struggle agaisnt apparhied and terrorism in fact most of the terrorists were home grown and  a majority had ID cards, similar to the London july  bombings

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
